items.name: case max
items.desc: A reduction function that computes the maximum value.

items.name: case argMax
items.desc: A reduction function that computes the index of the maximum value.

items.name: case mean
items.desc: A function for reduction that computes the mean value.

items.name: case meanNonZero
items.desc: A reduction function that computes the mean value of nonzero elements.

items.name: case min
items.desc: A reduction function that computes the minimum value.

items.name: case argMin
items.desc: A reduction function that computes the index of the minimum value.

items.name: case sum
items.desc: A reduction function that computes the sum of all values.

items.name: case sumOfAbsolutes
items.desc: A reduction function that computes the sum of all absolute values.

items.name: case sumOfLogs(epsilon: Float)
items.desc: A reduction function that computes the sum of the natural logarithm of all values.

items.name: case sumOfSquares
items.desc: A reduction function that computes the sum of the square of all values.

items.name: case logicalAnd
items.desc: A reduction function that computes the logical AND of all values.

items.name: case all
items.desc: An alias of the logical AND reduction function.

items.name: case logicalOr
items.desc: A reduction function that computes the logical OR of all values.

items.name: case any
items.desc: An alias of the logical OR reduction function.
